title: I Will Be Waiting
lyrics:
The feeling when your head gets
You'll know it when your head gets surreal
So feel it in the best way
And call it when the moment's revealed
And then you'll let your chest breathe
And your head stream

And make headway for your daydreams

And there's thinking

You try to excavate the feelings but they'd stay in

It's like the rhythm of the beat is just a feeling

But there's no need to feel the way that it does

When you're running and you feel so above it

And there's reason why we are redone

So pull yourself into the wind and say



I will be waiting for you, I

I will be waiting for you, I

It's lame, but I will keep waiting for you

It's lame, but I will be waiting



So pull yourself together now

Pull it all together now

Open up your head until your tears are streaming out

Then there'll be people in the line

Now spinning safely by my side

'Cause then our hands are at the corner of your desk until the ink runs out

And then you'll see yourself in the mirror of the piles of people singing out that that's the way, 'cause that's the way now

All your leaves will change with season, count to eight to hear the gleaming

But be prepared 'cause when you see it, everything will start competing



And I will be waiting for you, I

I will be waiting for you, I

It's late, but I will keep waiting for you

It's late, but I will be waiting



I will be waiting for you

And for the first time, it's just the first time

I will be waiting for you

And for the first time, it's just the first time I figured out

I will be waiting for you

And for the first time, it's just the first time

I will be waiting for you

And for the first time, it's just the first time I figured out

And for the first time, it's just the first time

And for the first time, it's just the first time I figured out
